data.title: APA Corporation
data.meta_description: APA Corporation contributes to global progress by helping meet the world's energy needs. Apache Corporation is a subsidiary of APA Corporation.
data.text:
At APA, we are focused on addressing the global, dual challenge of meeting growing energy demand in a cleaner, more sustainable way.

Learn more about the energy we produce and the role we play in our local communities to support human flourishing.

Learn More

We believe energy underpins human progress, and we want to be a part of the conversation and solution as society works to meet growing global demand for reliable and affordable energy.

Learn More Sustainability Report Watch APA's Approach to Sustainability

Since our founding, our success has been through the talent, confidence and determination of our team. We hire the best people in the exploration and production business, we encourage them to innovate and question conventional boundaries, and we retain them through challenging and rewarding work. If you want to take on big challenges and help elevate lives around the world, come join our team!

Our Careers
